title: Land For Sale Kandy (Kundasale)
details:
42.75 perches of flat land divided into 3 lots ( 14.25 x 3 ) Can be bought as a whole.

Parapet wall with a fence overhead already built around the land..

Rectangle shape, easy to build

Surrounding is nice and quiet, Residential Area close to Siri Gauthama Sambudu Maha Seya.

Only serious buyers please.
